titles.title: FISH Act of 2025
Fighting Foreign Illegal Seafood Harvests Act of 2025
FISH Act of 2025
To combat illegal, unreported, and unregulated fishing at its sources globally.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, Transportation and Infrastructure, the Judiciary, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
